terminal.commands: Available commands: about, projects, skills, contact, theme, language, clear, help
terminal.notFound: Command not found. Type 'help' for available commands.

about.title: Personnel File: Abdelrahmane Gacemi
about.intro: Greetings! I'm a passionate web and mobile developer with expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly applications. I specialize in both front-end and back-end development, delivering seamless digital experiences.
about.background: With a background in computer science and years of hands-on experience, I've developed a deep understanding of modern development frameworks and practices. I'm constantly exploring new technologies to enhance my skillset.
about.approach: My approach combines technical precision with creative problem-solving. I believe in clean code, intuitive design, and building applications that not only function flawlessly but also provide engaging user experiences.

items.title: DEC in Computer Science at Cégep de Rosemont
items.description: Specialization in web and mobile application development.

items.title: Cineflix API
items.description: Cineflix, REST API for movie reviews and ratings
items.longDescription: Cineflix API is a movie review and rating management API inspired by IMDb. It allows users to publish reviews, assign ratings, search for movies, and view rankings based on user evaluations.

items.title: AnswerSphere
items.longDescription: AnswerSphere is a survey web application developed in C# with ASP.NET. It offers an API and web interface for creating, managing, and responding to questionnaires through complete CRUD functionalities on questions and answers.

items.title: Hangman Game
items.longDescription: Small mobile hangman game: guess the word within a limited number of attempts. Simple interface, clear logic, and Gradle structure for Android. Developed in Java.

items.title: CodeMirror6 Research
items.longDescription: Prototype integration of CodeMirror 6 in a Vue app, aiming to replace CodeMirror 5 while preserving syntax highlighting, themes, events, and adding completion, multi-file support, and collaborative editing.

items.title: CosmoRunner
items.longDescription: 3D game prototype developed in Unity (2022.3.13f1) and C#: movement controls, collision and game state management, with a technical base ready to extend (UI, shaders).

items.title: StageAvenir
items.longDescription: Kotlin/Spring Boot API with a mobile client app for managing internships at Collège de Rosemont: students browse and apply, companies post and respond, professors coordinate/follow up and generate contracts; testable via Postman.
features: Students: browse offers, apply, create requests, track applications.
Companies: respond to requests, post offers, accept/reject applications.
Professors (coordinator/supervisor): review requests, approve/reject offers, generate contracts, ensure follow-up.

items.title: Musica One
items.longDescription: Musica One is a web clone of Spotify built with PHP, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap: browse by playlists/albums, integrated audio player, search for tracks/artists, and basic favorites management. Responsive design.

items.title: TindArt
items.longDescription: Web application inspired by Tinder for art, designed during an internship: users swipe artworks to like/ignore. A preference model learns their taste and suggests recommendations by style, era, and artist, with history and profile.
